comment.author: 51979177@N02
comment._content: I wonder whether they're arranged in alphabetical order or by date. I assume that any socialists present would be on the left...or more likely left right out...I don't imagine star Australian literature bibliophile E. Morris Miller would have been a socialist...but then he's sitting on the right...well, their left, but...all up it's interesting to see such a large number of women in the group...
